guardian.title: Craig Hicks indicted over North Carolina shootings of three Muslim students
guardian.topComment: Gun-totin atheists scare the shit out of me every bit as much as gun-totin freaks of any other description. What they have in common is guns. Take the guns away and what you have is a bunch of annoying but mostly harmless people. This seems so obviou...
